report.title: Samples list for map
report.description: A very simple map for the samples in UKBMS
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples sp JOIN surveys su on su.id=sp.survey_id and su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values sens on sens.location_id=sp.location_id and sens.location_attribute_id=#sensAttr# and sens.deleted=false WHERE #website_filter# AND sp.deleted=false AND sp.parent_id is null AND (sens.int_value is null or sens.int_value=0)

column.name: fo
column.sql: case max(extract(year from sp.date_start)) when extract(year from now()) then 0.6 else 0.4 end

column.name: fc
column.sql: case max(extract(year from sp.date_start))when extract(year from now()) then 'red' else 'blue' end
